Technique: FAYENCE; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; GLAZED
Name: Drop bead, element of a beaded collar
Description: Drop beads like this pendant of blue faience (probably imitating a petal of the blue lotus flower) could be incorporated into broad collars with their floral motifs. Dating of a separate unprovenanced bead causes a problem, however, necklaces with such pendants were manufactured in abundance in the 18th dynasty.
